PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-01582021-03-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Interim Order Respecting the Importation, Sale and Advertising of Drugs for Use in Relation to COVID-19)
PrecisRegulations amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (INTERIM ORDER RESPECTING THE IMPORTATION, SALE AND ADVERTISING OF DRUGS FOR USE IN RELATION TO COVID-19) in order to create flexibilities in the drug authorization process, allowing their sale, import and distribution to address the COVID-19 immediate public health risk.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0045 Publication Date: 2021-03-31
AttachmentsAttachment
